means: 阿狄森（姓氏； Thomas, 1793-1860，英国医生）

sentence.Network_en: Where do you rank Addison as an essayist?
sentence.Network_cn: 你把阿狄生列为哪一类散文家?

sentence.Network_en: Only a few days before he had predicted an eventual smash to Addison.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在前几天,他曾向爱迪生预言过可能发生的倒闭.

sentence.Network_en: Many years after their hey - day at home , Addison and Steele were still carefully imitated in America.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾迪生和蒂尔的全盛时期过去许多年后, 在美国还有许多人细心模仿他们.

list.abs: 艾迪生病（addison' s disease）即原发性慢性肾上腺皮质功能不全症，系双侧肾上腺皮质因自身免疫、结核、浸润等原因遭到广泛破 …
